txt.en:
[placeholder],

I have need to see you in Bree. There is a matter that requires the champion's skill, and I think that it shall be a good way to teach you.

Oggur
'I am pleased at your arrival. This will be a good test for you, I think.'
You received a letter from your trainer in Bree-town asking for you to return to him. Apparently, there is something that he wishes to teach you.
Bring the letter to Oggur in Bree
Oggur sent you a letter requesting that you visit him in the Bree Jail.\n\nDeliver the letter to Oggur. He can be found in the Bree Jail.
